errors.clickToGoHome: Click here to go back to Home Page

homeIntro.intro1: I'm Rodo and I am a rather average software engineer with an average background. I did OK at uni and have an OK job. And there's absolutely nothing wrong about that.
homeIntro.intro2: That statement is my first step to personal fulfillment.
homeIntro.intro3: But at the same time, I always strive to be better and by acknowledging I'm nowhere near great, I have more motivation to grow.
homeIntro.intro4: The road to greatness starts with acknowledging the need to start.

homePodcast.title: Sharing is caring. Why I started my podcast.
homePodcast.intro1: Born in a small city widely known for its elephant as the main transport, somehow my parents managed to save enough for me to study abroad at QUT in Brisbane, Australia. It is the BEST thing that happens to me.
homePodcast.intro2: Yet, I feel like I could have used that time more wisely and productively so I want to share all my learnings, my lessons and my experiences with you. #software_engineer #life_experience #career

list100.intro: We all have 1 life. Why not making the most of it and do exciting things? These goals below keep me waking up everyday with a spirit on fire and I plan to do them before I die. Inspired by Chip Huyen's.

items.teachUni: Teach a course in university (CAB403, CAB230, IFB102 at QUT)
items.reach10kSubs: Reach 10,000 subs on any social platform
items.foundTechCompany: Found a tech company in Vietnam and it survives :)
items.giveTalk100: Give a talk to >100 audiences (like... any talk)
items.establishMentorship: Establish a Mentorship Program/AlumNetwork in my high school
items.foundFarm: Found an organic modern farm (my father's dream)
items.getPhD: Get a PhD (I would be the 1st Dr in my family)
items.familyHoliday: Rich enough to have a 14-day holiday with my family
items.nzMountains: Visit New Zealand's mountains (I've seen them but next time I want to get closer and do some hiking)
items.islandVacation: Have a vacation on an island/a yatch
items.pyramidGiza: Check-in at Great Pyramid of Giza, Egypt
items.campMilkyWay: Camp and enjoy the Milky Way Galaxy
items.everestBaseCamp: Hike to Everest base camp + see the Hymalayas
items.chessBoxing: Participate in a chess boxing match
items.buyHouseParents: Buy a house for my parents to retire in Australia
items.islandWedding: Get married on an island and honeymoon around the world
items.workBigFinance: Work in a giant financial insitution
items.learnInstrument: Learn to play a musical instrument (guitar)
items.connect10Founders: Connect with 10 start-up founders (GPIB, RSP, Electrafi, AerVision, Concensus Layer, Labrys)
items.doWhatYouLove: Do what you love, default 'no' to the rest

list100.wishListIntro: This helps mitigate the headache of my close friends as my birthday approaches. Love, Rodo <3

timeLeft.assumption: If you can live up to 80 years old, assumingly don't get any genetec adjustments or have your body frozen, and survive through maybe a few more financial crises, social revolutions, artificial intelligent impact, cancers, epidemics, then...
timeLeft.timeLeftLabel: the amount of time you have left is:
timeLeft.minusLast10: Oh maybe minus the last 10 useless weak-ass years of your life as well, now you have
timeLeft.newPerspective: Through this new len of looking at life expectancy, I hope you now think about your life a bit differently.
timeLeft.feelWorse: Can I make you feel worse? Try with your parent's DoB.
